nodes.bodyText: Isn't this overridden anyway when deploying to Openshift? Or is it for local testing?

The name of the method suggests we will always return DOWN response, but it depends on the state parameter. Can we remain it to just buildReponse or buildHealthCheckResponse for the sake of readability?

Just FYI, after this is merged we will have 3 almost identical InfinispanServerTestResource classes. Wdyt about unifying them? I can create a separate module for test resources/test classes in general so we won't duplicate things. Wdyt @cristianonicolai ?

Just an organizational question. Since this is really not an addon, rather a permanent part of jobs-service, wouldn't it make more sense to put it in the job-service module? Or do we want to include it into the Kogito generated app as well in the future? Then I guess it won't make sense for Spring Boot runtime.
